Function reference

PURPLE

Functions related to PURPLE (https://github.com/hartwigmedical/hmftools/tree/master/purple)

purple_cnv_germ_process()
Process PURPLE CNV germline File for UMCCRISE
purple_cnv_germ_read()
Read PURPLE CNV Germline File
purple_cnv_som_gene_process()
Process PURPLE CNV Gene File for UMCCRISE
purple_cnv_som_gene_read()
Read PURPLE CNV Gene File
purple_cnv_som_process()
Process PURPLE CNV Somatic File for UMCCRISE
purple_cnv_som_read()
Read PURPLE CNV Somatic File
purple_kataegis()
Get PURPLE Kataegis Regions
purple_purity_read()
Read PURPLE Purity file
purple_qc_read()
Read PURPLE QC file
purple_snv_vcf_read()
Read PURPLE Somatic SNV VCF
purple_version_read()
Read PURPLE version file

LINX

Functions related to LINX (https://github.com/hartwigmedical/hmftools/tree/master/linx)

linx_breakend_process()
Process LINX Breakend File
linx_breakend_read()
Read LINX Breakend File
linx_clusters_process()
Process LINX Clusters File
linx_clusters_read()
Read LINX Clusters File
linx_drivercatalog_process()
Process LINX Driver Catalog File
linx_drivercatalog_read()
Read LINX Driver Catalog File
linx_drivers_process()
Process LINX Drivers File
linx_drivers_read()
Read LINX Drivers File
linx_fusion_process()
Process LINX Fusion File
linx_fusion_read()
Read LINX Fusion File
linx_links_process()
Process LINX Links File
linx_links_read()
Read LINX Links File
linx_rmd()
Generate LINX R Markdown HTML Report
linx_svs_process()
Process LINX SVS File
linx_svs_read()
Read LINX SVS File
linx_viscopynumber_read()
Read LINX VisCopyNumber File
linx_visfusion_read()
Read LINX VisFusion File
linx_visgeneexon_read()
Read LINX VisGeneExon File
linx_visproteindomain_read()
Read LINX VisProteinDomain File
linx_vissegments_read()
Read LINX VisSegments File
linx_vissvdata_read()
Read LINX VisSvData File

umccrise

Functions related to umccrise (https://github.com/umccr/umccrise)

abbreviate_effect()
Abbreviate SV Effects
af_summary()
umccrise AF summary
EFFECT_ABBREVIATIONS
Abbreviations for SV effects
hrd_results_tabs()
HRDetect and CHORD Summary Table
plot_bnd_sr_pr_tot_lines()
Line plot for SR, PR and SR + PR for BNDs
plot_bnd_sr_pr_tot_hist()
Histogram for SR, PR and SR + PR for BNDs
process_sv()
Process Structural Variants
umccrise_read_sv_tsv()
Read SV TSV
write_jsongz()
Write gzipped JSON
write_tsvgz()
Write a data frame to a tab delimited gzipped file
write_tsvjsongz()
Write a data frame to gzipped TSV and JSON files

Others

count_pieces()
Count Number of Parts in a String
is_vcf()
Does the input file look like a VCF?
split_double_col()
Split Two-Field Column
tsv_is_empty()
Does the TSV file contain any non-header rows?
vcf_is_empty()
Does the VCF file contain any variants?
pkg_exists()
Does R Package Exist
session_info_kable()
Session Information Kable
mkdir()
Create directory
